item.title: some free music
item.description: This week my iPod also got some fresh music. Coldplay published their Live-Album LeftRightLeftRightLeft (via), some blogs published Daft Punk remixes (via), Mike Skinner from The Strees pushed some music via Twitter into the web “The Twitter” (via) and just a few minutes ago the Sub Pop CyberSex Sampler found the way into my iPod (via). Pretty good week so far :P Finally a Beethoven-remix from Soulwax (via) [audio:http://cache03-music02.myspacecdn.com/61/std_9b57d13da38e4c6b80e3e8dddf7580a8.mp3] Edit: Music To Feed Your Soul During Crucial Design Moments
